rs.raf.storage.spec.core

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • rs.raf.storage.spec.core.Storage

  • public abstract class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract representation of storage.

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static Storage instance()
                        throws DriverNotRegisteredException
        Returns single live Storage instance.
        Returns:
        Storage instance.
        Throws:
        DriverNotRegisteredException - if storage driver implementation has not been registered.

      • connect

        public final void connect(java.lang.String uid,
                          java.lang.String path,
                          User user)
                   throws StorageException
        Template method for connecting currently active user to storage represented by unique id that located on path.
        Parameters:
        uid - Storage unique identifier.
        path - Storage location, i.e., registry file parent directory.
        user - Currently active user.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if registry file could not be loaded.

      • disconnect

        public final void disconnect(User user)
                      throws StorageException
        Template method for disconnecting currently active user to storage.
        Parameters:
        user - Currently active user.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if registry file could not be saved.

      • onConnect

        protected abstract void onConnect()
        Should be overridden in Storage implementation to handle connect operation.

      • onDisconnect

        protected abstract void onDisconnect()
        Should be overridden in Storage implementation to handle disconnect operation.

      • buildRoot

        protected abstract Directory buildRoot(java.lang.String path)
        Should be overridden in Storage implementation to handle building root from provided path.

      • getUid

        public final java.lang.String getUid()
        Returns currently active user.

      • getRoot

        public final Directory getRoot()
        Returns abstract root directory representation.

      • getRootPath

        public final java.lang.String getRootPath()
        Returns root path.

      • getRegistryPath

        public final java.lang.String getRegistryPath()
        Returns registry file path.

      • getOwner

        public final User getOwner()
        Returns storage owner.

      • getActiveUser

        public final User getActiveUser()
        Returns currently active user.

      • addUser

        public final void addUser(User user)
                   throws PrivilegeException
        Adds new user to storage.
        Parameters:
        user - Newly created user to be added.
        Throws:
        PrivilegeException - if currently active user does not have privilege to manage other users.

      • removeUser

        public final void removeUser(User user)
                      throws PrivilegeException
        Removes existing user from storage.
        Parameters:
        user - Existing user to be removed.
        Throws:
        PrivilegeException - if currently active user does not have privilege to manage other users.

      • getUsers

        public final java.util.List<User> getUsers()
        Returns list of all storage users.

      • forbidType

        public final void forbidType(java.lang.String type)
        Forbid file with provided type to be uploaded to storage.
        Parameters:
        type - Type to be forbidden, i.e., file extension.

      • allowType

        public final void allowType(java.lang.String type)
        Allow file with provided type to be uploaded to storage.
        Parameters:
        type - Type to be allowed, i.e., file extension.

      • getForbiddenTypes

        public final java.util.List<java.lang.String> getForbiddenTypes()
        Returns:
        List of forbidden types, i.e., file extensions.
